Eek! May have spoken too soon guys.

Tash -

please take a look at the mobile view. It's not great. The headline images are cut off and the request a free quote and property styling services > buttons stack and don't sit under the divisional pics any longer.

I haven't looked at the sub-urls to see how they behave in mobile format.

Given >50% of audience are now accessing sites on mobile devices, you may want to fix this before going live.

Dan

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: @manuel - can you please work through the below and tag me once done? Cheers

Hi Heath

Ive had a good look through the site and we’re nearly there. There are a couple things as detailed below, along with the menu overlap on the footer as per previous email and then were good to go.

The side menu under Interior Design Services – “Outdoor” doesn’t link to a page (drop down menu ok)
Under Property Styling Services > Home Preparation doesn’t have a side menu. The other side menu links to that page dont go anywhere.

FOOTER – useful links
can we link “our work” to the new gallery
Replace “our process” with property styling (linked to Property styling services page)
Replace “before and after” with interior design (linked to Interior design services page)
Contact and FAQ can stay (I’ll fix up FAQ page later)

Thank you!

Natasha Adams
